languages.text: "По живому да ржавым лезвием, шерин, резать любите. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}Нет у меня больше банды{/d}... Да и не думаю, что она нужна. Одной точке достаточно и пары верных агентов, что кормятся прямо из моего кармана. Достаточно смышленых, чтобы дела делались. И недостаточно для того, чтобы понимать, как туго у них поводок натянут". {n}Джай ухмыляется и дергает за невидимую петлю на шее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "По живому да ржавым лезвием, шерин, резать любите. Нет у меня больше банды... Да и не думаю, что она нужна. Одной точке достаточно и пары верных агентов, что кормятся прямо из моего кармана. Досточно смышленных, чтобы дела делались. И недосточно для того, чтобы понимать, как туго у них поводок натянут". {n}Джай ухмыляется и дергает за невидимую петлю на шее.{/n}

languages.text: "You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}I don't have a gang anymore{/d}... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realise they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins and tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}
languages.original_text: "По живому да ржавым лезвием, шерин, резать любите. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}Нет у меня больше банды{/d}... Да и не думаю, что она нужна. Одной точке достаточно и пары верных агентов, что кормятся прямо из моего кармана. Достаточно смышленых, чтобы дела делались. И недостаточно для того, чтобы понимать, как туго у них поводок натянут". {n}Джай ухмыляется и дергает за невидимую петлю на шее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. I don't have a gang anymore... Nor do I think I need it. A single location can be ran by a couple of loyal agents you pay directly from your pocket, smart enough to do business but too stupid to realize they are being kept of a short leash." {n}Jae grins at tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

"You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. I don't have a gang anymore... Nor do I think I need it. A single location can be ran by a couple of loyal agents you pay directly from your pocket, smart enough to do business but too stupid to realize they are being kept of a short leash." {n}Jae grins at tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

"You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. I don't have a gang anymore... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realize they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins at tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

"You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. I don't have a gang anymore... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realize they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins at tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

"You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}I don't have a gang anymore{/d}... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realise they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins at tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

languages.text: “你已经用钝刀子切开了我的伤口，亲爱的，没必要再往上面撒盐了。{d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}我已经没有什么帮派了{/d}……而且我认为，我也不再需要了。我只需要几位忠诚的代理人，直接从我自己的口袋里支付报酬，就可以管理好我的地盘。那些人需要足够的智慧来完成工作，但也要有足够的愚蠢，不能意识到脖子上的铁链其实收得很紧。”{n}婕伊笑了笑，拽了一下脖子上无形的绞索。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}I don't have a gang anymore{/d}... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realise they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins and tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你已经用钝刀子切开了我的伤口，亲爱的，没必要再往上面撒盐了。{d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}我已经没有什么帮派了{/d}……而且我认为，我也不再需要了。我只需要几位忠诚的代理人，直接从我自己的口袋里支付报酬，就可以管理好我的地盘。那些人需要足够的智慧来完成工作，但也要有足够的愚蠢，不能意识到脖子上的铁链其实收得很紧。”{n}婕伊笑了笑，拽了一下脖子上无形的绞索。{/n}
“你已经用钝刀子切开了我的伤口，亲爱的，没必要再往上面撒盐了。{d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}我已经没有什么帮派了{/d}……而且我认为，我也不再需要了。我只需要几位忠诚的代理人，直接从我自己的口袋里支付报酬，就可以管理好我的地盘。那些人需要足够的智慧来完成工作，但也要有足够的愚蠢，不能意识到脖子上的铁链其实收得很紧。”{n}婕伊笑了笑，拽了一下脖子上无形的绞索。{/n}

languages.original_text: "You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. I don't have a gang anymore... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realise they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins at tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

languages.text: «Ya ha abierto la herida con un cuchillo oxidado, shereen, no tiene por qué echarle sal. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}Ya no tengo banda{/d}... y no creo que la necesite. Bastan un par de agentes leales para controlar una ubicación, especialmente si les pago personalmente. Tienen que ser lo bastante listos para hacer el trabajo, pero no tanto como para darse cuenta de que los tengo atados cortos». {n}Jae sonríe y tira de una soga imaginaria en su cuello.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}I don't have a gang anymore{/d}... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realise they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins and tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ya ha abierto la herida con un cuchillo oxidado, shereen, no tiene por qué echarle sal. Ya no tengo banda... y no creo que la necesite. Bastan un par de agentes leales para controlar una ubicación, especialmente si les pago personalmente. Tienen que ser lo bastante listos para hacer el trabajo, pero no tanto como para darse cuenta de que los tengo atados cortos». {n}Jae sonríe y tira de una soga imaginaria en su cuello.{/n}

languages.text: 「もう錆びたナイフで傷口を開いてしまったのだから、塩を塗りたくる必要はないわ、シャリーン。{d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}あたしにはもうギャングはいない{/d}…必要ないと思っているの。拠点ひとつくらいなら、あたしのポケットマネーで直接雇っている数人の忠実なエージェントで運営できるわ。彼らは仕事をこなせる程度には賢くなくちゃいけないけれど、自分が束縛されていることに気づかない程度には愚かでなくちゃならないの」{n}ジェイはニヤリと笑い、首にかけられた見えない縄を引っ張る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}I don't have a gang anymore{/d}... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realise they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins and tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もう錆びたナイフで傷口を開いてしまったのだから、塩を塗りたくる必要はないわ、シャリーン。{d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}あたしにはもうギャングはいない{/d}…必要ないと思っているの。拠点ひとつくらいなら、あたしのポケットマネーで直接雇っている数人の忠実なエージェントで運営できるわ。彼らは仕事をこなせる程度には賢くなくちゃいけないけれど、自分が束縛されていることに気づかない程度には愚かでなくちゃならないの」{n}ジェイはニヤリと笑い、首にかけられた見えない縄を引っ張る。{/n}

「もう錆びたナイフで傷口を開いてしまったのだから、塩を塗りたくる必要はないよ。{d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}アタシにはもうギャングはいない{/d}…必要ないと思っている。ひとつの拠点は、アタシのポケットマネーから直接支払われる数人の忠実なエージェントで運営できる。彼らは仕事をこなせるほど賢くなければならないが、自分が束縛されていることに気づかないほど愚かでなければならない」{n}ジェイはニヤリと笑い、首にかけられた見えない縄を引っ張る。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt die Wunde bereits mit einem rostigen Messer geöffnet, Shereen, Ihr müsst nicht auch noch Salz hineinreiben. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}Ich habe keine Bande mehr{/d} ... Und ich denke, ich brauche auch keine. Ein einziger Standort kann von ein paar treuen Agenten geführt werden, die ich direkt aus eigener Tasche bezahle. Sie müssen klug genug sein, um die Arbeit hinzubekommen, aber dumm genug, um nicht zu merken, dass sie an der kurzen Leine gehalten werden." {n}Jae grinst und zieht an der unsichtbaren Henkersschlinge um ihren Hals.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}I don't have a gang anymore{/d}... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realise they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins and tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt die Wunde bereits mit einem rostigen Messer geöffnet, Shereen, Ihr müsst nicht auch noch Salz hineinreiben. Ich habe keine Bande mehr ... Und ich denke, ich brauche auch keine. Ein einziger Standort kann von ein paar treuen Agenten geführt werden, die ich direkt aus eigener Tasche bezahle. Sie müssen klug genug sein, um die Arbeit hinzubekommen, aber dumm genug, um nicht zu merken, dass sie an der kurzen Leine gehalten werden." {n}Jae grinst und zieht an der unsichtbaren Henkersschlinge um ihren Hals.{/n}

"Ihr habt die Wunde bereits mit einem rostigen Messer geöffnet, Shereen, Ihr müsst nicht auch noch Salz hineinreiben. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}Ich habe keine Bande mehr{/d} ... Und ich denke, ich brauche auch keine. Ein einziger Standort kann von ein paar treuen Agenten geführt werden, die ich direkt aus eigener Tasche bezahle. Sie müssen klug genug sein, um die Arbeit hinzubekommen, aber dumm genug, um nicht zu merken, dass sie an der kurzen Leine gehalten werden." {n}Jae grinst und zieht an der unsichtbaren Henkersschlinge um ihren Hals.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous avez déjà rouvert cette plaie avec un couteau rouillé, shereen, inutile de le remuer ainsi. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}Je n'ai plus de bande{/d}... et je ne pense pas en avoir besoin. Il suffit d'une poignée d'agents loyaux, payés de ma propre poche, pour gérer un seul secteur. Ils devront avoir la tête bien remplie pour jouer leur rôle correctement, sans toutefois être assez malins pour réaliser qu'ils sont tenus en laisse. » {n}Jae sourit en faisant mine de tirer sur une corde autour de son cou.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}I don't have a gang anymore{/d}... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realise they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins and tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez déjà rouvert cette plaie avec un couteau rouillé, shereen, inutile de le remuer ainsi. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}Je n'ai plus de bande{/d}... et je ne pense pas en avoir besoin. Il suffit d'une poignée d'agents loyaux, payés de ma propre poche, pour gérer un seul secteur. Ils devront avoir la tête bien remplie pour jouer leur rôle correctement, sans toutefois être assez malins pour réaliser qu'ils sont tenus en laisse. » {n}Jae sourit en faisant mine de tirer sur une corde autour de son cou.{/n}

languages.text: "Yaramı kör bıçakla deştin şirinim, bir de tuz basmana gerek yok. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}Artık bir çetem yok{/d}, çeteye ihtiyacım da yok sanırım. Tek bir lokasyon, parasını cebimden ödediğim bir iki sadık çalışan tarafından çekip çevrilebilir. İşlerini yapacak kadar kafaları çalışsa ama tasmalarını elimde tuttuğumun farkına varamayacakları kadar da çalışmasa yeter." {n}Jae, gülerek boynundaki hayalî tasmaya asılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have already opened the wound with a rusty knife, shereen, there is no need to rub salt into it. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}I don't have a gang anymore{/d}... And I don't think I need it. A single location can be run by a couple of loyal agents paid directly from my own pocket. They need to be smart enough to do the work, but stupid enough not to realise they are being kept on a short leash." {n}Jae grins and tugs at the invisible noose on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yaramı kör bıçakla deştin şirinim, bir de tuz basmana gerek yok. {d|Encyclopedia:JaeGuysDead}Artık bir çetem yok{/d}, çeteye ihtiyacım da yok sanırım. Tek bir lokasyon, parasını cebimden ödediğim bir iki sadık çalışan tarafından çekip çevrilebilir. İşlerini yapacak kadar kafaları çalışsa ama tasmalarını elimde tuttuğumun farkına varamayacakları kadar da çalışmasa yeter." {n}Jae, gülerek boynundaki hayalî tasmaya asılıyor.{/n}
